scripts.dev:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=h5 vue-cli-service uni-serve --mode dev
scripts.dev:mp-alipay: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-alipay vue-cli-service uni-build --watch --mode dev
scripts.dev:mp-weixin: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --watch --mode dev
scripts.dev:mp-weixin-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --watch --mode test
scripts.build:h5-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=h5 vue-cli-service uni-build --mode test
scripts.build:mp-alipay-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-alipay vue-cli-service uni-build --mode test
scripts.build:mp-weixin-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --mode test
scripts.build:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=h5 vue-cli-service uni-build --mode prod
scripts.build:mp-alipay: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-alipay vue-cli-service uni-build --mode prod
scripts.build:mp-weixin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production UNI_PLATFORM=mp-weixin vue-cli-service uni-build --mode prod
